attributes.action: immediately release Ronnie Biggs from prison as recommended by the Parole Board. It is unjust and inhumane for the Secretary of State for Justice to leave Mr. Biggs to die in prison.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite the recommendation of the Parole Board to release Ronald Biggs on 3 July 2009, the Secretary of State for Justice, Mr. Jack Straw MP, has refused to do so. Mr. Straw’s decision appears to be based on the rumour and myths surrounding Ronald Biggs and the Great Train Robbery rather than the actual facts of the case. The Prime Minister and Secretary of State for Justice should urgently review their ruling and free Ronald Biggs.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
